verses.text: \w Happy|strong="H0835"\w* \w is|strong="H6588"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* who \w has|strong="H1732"\w* forgiveness \w for|strong="H1732"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* wrongdoing, \w and|strong="H1732"\w* whose \w sin|strong="H2401"\w* \w is|strong="H6588"\w* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w*.
